---
title: "Research"
---

My research leverages clinical metadata and whole-genome sequencing to study the evolution and spread of antibiotic resistant bacteria in complex patient populations, including long-term acute care hospitals and households.

For the complete list of my publications, please visit my [Google Scholar profile](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=hG4WnBEAAAAJ&hl=en).
